TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DataListCommandEventHandler(object source, DataListCommandEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DataListCommandEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DataListCommandEventHandler(source As Object, e As DataListCommandEventArgs)
public delegate void DataListCommandEventHandler(System::Object ^ source, DataListCommandEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 、、、 和 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , , and events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时`Cancel`中的项的按钮控件被单击。The event is raised when the `Cancel` button for an item in the control is clicked. 引发事件时`Delete`中的项的按钮控件被单击。The event is raised when the `Delete` button for an item in the control is clicked. 引发事件时`Edit`中的项的按钮控件被单击。The event is raised when the `Edit` button for an item in the control is clicked. 任一按钮中的项时会引发事件控件被单击。The event is raised when any button for an item in the control is clicked. 这允许你以编程方式单击特定的命令按钮时测试和采取适当的措施。This allows you to programmatically test for when a specific command button is clicked and take appropriate action. 此事件通常用于处理自定义命令按钮控件。This event is commonly used to handle custom command buttons for the control. 引发事件时`Update`中的项的按钮控件被单击。The event is raised when the `Update` button for an item in the control is clicked. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义事件处理程序， ，和的事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to define event handlers for the , , and events of a control. 此示例指定的事件处理程序以声明方式，在上设置的事件处理程序的每个命令属性控件。This example specifies the event handlers declaratively, setting the event handler for each command property on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/CS/datalisteditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit/VB/datalisteditvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式将它们添加到中的事件并指定事件处理程序`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handlers and programmatically add them to the events in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/CS/datalistedit2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListEdit2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListEdit2/VB/datalistedit2vb.aspx#1)]
